CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1962, pg. C2, reads: "Distinguished - Shown are (left to right) : Courier Achievement Award Winners John M. Brewer, Education; Wilburt L. Holloway, Art; Mrs. J.C. Hairston, Churchwoman, and Mr. Stokes, who accepted the Sports Award for his ailing son, Maurice Stokes."
TitMainTitle: John M. Brewer Sr., Wilburt L. Holloway, Mrs. J. C. Hairston, and Mr. Stokes, proxy for son Maurice Stokes, holding award plaques received during Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper's Appreciation Day Rally at Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall
CatSubject_tab: Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Plaques, plaquettes--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Awards--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Brewer, John.
